type.description:
This is the format of a JSON file describing a power. Powers are used to give functionality to origins. 

Power JSON files need to be placed inside the `data/<namespace>/powers` folder of your datapack. The said files can be referenced as `namespace:path/to/power` (`data/namespace/powers/path/to/power.json`) in the `powers` field of an [Origin (JSON)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/json/power) file.

Depending on the chosen `type`, power JSONs have more required and optional fields. See the corresponding power type page for a description of what those fields are.
type.markdownDescription:
This is the format of a JSON file describing a power. Powers are used to give functionality to origins. 

Power JSON files need to be placed inside the `data/<namespace>/powers` folder of your datapack. The said files can be referenced as `namespace:path/to/power` (`data/namespace/powers/path/to/power.json`) in the `powers` field of an [Origin (JSON)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/json/power) file.

Depending on the chosen `type`, power JSONs have more required and optional fields. See the corresponding power type page for a description of what those fields are.
